summary: Exploding Critters go boom on people you don't like or on you with negligent summoning.
descriptionHtml:
Exploding Critters Version 1

Description/Location/whatever else
====================================================
This mod adds three new summons (Rabbit, Goat and Elk) that are based around the Flaming familiar found in the High Gate Ruin (If you completed it correctly).

The spell books are located in the Thaumaturgist's Hut in Morthal, yes you'll have to steal them because I didn't bother messing with a merchant chest/leveled list for something so small.

Conjuration perks that reduce the cost of summons effect these summons (Although their cost is rather low already).

Requirement
====================================================
Nothing really other than a working copy of Skyrim. It is pretty self contained.

Install
====================================================
Extract to your Skyrim Data folder and check the Exploding Critters.Esp in whatever mod manager you use (Wrye Bash, NMM, etc).


Credits, permissions and whatnots (in that order).
====================================================
Myself

Feel free to do whatever you want with this, expand it, make it better or worse, patch it, translations I don't really care. Go wild to your hearts content. (Cathedral modding is much more community friendly than Parlor modding).

If you do choose to do something with it, it would be nice to hear about it but its fine if I don't hear about it.

Misc. Notes
====================================================

They may have a sixty second duration but I HIGHLY RECOMMEND not casting them all willy-nilly like the average summon because they have a tendency to explode everywhere and yes their explosion hurts you too as well as any NPC in the wrong place at the wrong time. Its just how it works.

Why I used the term Critter? Because I associate that term with the random wildlife found in older RTS's (Warcraft, Starcraft etc).

On how much damage they do, Rabbit/45, Goat/50, Elk/100.


-Flintlocke.
author: Flintlockecole
